summary: A fierce Immortal warrior called Regnier has traveled to skyrim from the continent called Bersia, He was king of the land called Hexter, And now he has come to skyrim to serve the mighty Dragonborn that he has heard of.
descriptionHtml:
[B][COLOR=#974806][SIZE=7][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Regnier The Immortal[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]









[COLOR=#974806][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][U]Description[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Regnier The Immortal - The former lord of the land called Hexter in the continent Bersia, He has heard many things of the Dragonborn in Skyrim so he decided to leave Hexter and travel to the land they call Skyrim to serve the mighty Dragonborn. Regnier has his own cool animation too.

You can find Regnier in \"The Drunken Huntsman\" in Whiterun. This is my first mod so be nice. Please leave comments and dont forget endorsements. :D





[COLOR=#974806][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][U]Installation[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Put the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Cant get any easier.








[COLOR=#974806][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][U]Bug Report[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
There are currently no bugs.
Please leave a comment if you find any bugs.







[COLOR=#974806][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][U]Credits[/U][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
Big Thanks To These People, and dont forget to check out their mods too!

Regnier\'s Armor - Alextrep - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4187062

Regnier\'s Horns - Volvaga0 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3147615

Regnier\'s Sword - Thebrommers - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3219071
author: regnier1
